name: Unauthorized online transactions
descr: Protects the hard-earned money with a plan that provides the prospect with a 100% cover against fraudulent online purchases on the bank account, credit/ debit card or e-wallet

name: Phishing & Email Spoofing
descr: Pure Financial loss sustained by Insured by being an innocent victim of an act of Phishing by a third party. Prosecution costs against a Third party for phishing attack

name: Damage to e-reputation
descr: It takes only a few seconds for a troll to tarnish your reputation in the digital world. With E-Protect stay shielded against such threats.

name: Identity theft
descr: Defense costs as a result of any claim by affected party. Prosecution costs against a Third party for identity theft. Costs of transportation to court and photocopying of documents

name: Cyber bullying
descr: Protects the prospect against cyber bullying against messages sent to the prospect which are intimidating or threatening nature.

name: e-Extortion
descr: Protects the prospect against blackmailers and ransomware attacks. Prosecution costs against a Third party for Cyber Extortion
